items.badge_description: Another year down! Cheers to 2019 and all the delicious beer adventures to come! What're you looking forward to trying most?

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 45 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 40 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 9!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 80 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 17.

beer.beer_name: Barrel Aged Coppermine Creek Dry Stout

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 9)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 10!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 20 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 5!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 40 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 35 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 8!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 75 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 16.
Here's to a magical Christmas full of joy, cheer, and great beer. We wish you and yours a truly happy and wonderful brew-mas.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 8)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 9!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 35 distinct venues!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 3!

beer.beer_name: Partner Ships #8: Hoppy Wheat Ale With Citrus

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 40 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 50 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 11!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 15 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 4.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 70 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 15.
Wishing you a happy and brew-filled Hanukkah. We hope you have a wonderful eight night of celebration with friends, family, and great beer!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 45 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 35 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 8!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 30 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: Not too hoppy. Similar bitterness to a pale ale, which I like.

items.checkin_comment: A little sweet, but still good
